name: Discord Channel
description: Connect Agent Zero to Discord. Responds to DMs, @mentions, command prefixes, and slash commands.

bot_token.label: Bot Token
bot_token.description: Discord bot token from the Developer Portal

owner_user_id.label: Owner User ID
owner_user_id.description: Your Discord user ID. Only this user can DM the bot. Leave empty to allow all.

command_prefix.label: Command Prefix
command_prefix.description: Prefix for legacy text commands (e.g. !a0 hello). Slash commands (/a0) always work.

respond_to_dms.label: Respond to DMs
respond_to_dms.description: Allow the bot to respond to direct messages

respond_to_mentions.label: Respond to Mentions
respond_to_mentions.description: Allow the bot to respond when @mentioned in channels

thread_bindings_enabled.label: Thread Bindings
thread_bindings_enabled.description: Enable /focus and /unfocus commands to bind Discord threads to sub-agent sessions

thread_bindings_ttl_hours.label: Thread Binding TTL (hours)
thread_bindings_ttl_hours.description: Auto-unfocus threads after this many hours of inactivity (0 = never)

streaming_mode.label: Streaming Mode
streaming_mode.description: Live stream preview mode: off, partial (edit single message), or block (chunked drafts)

dm_policy.label: DM Policy
dm_policy.description: DM access policy: open (anyone), owner (owner only), pairing (code-based approval), disabled
